biocontainers.name: metawrap
biocontainers.summary: Metawrap is a pipeline for genome-resolved metagenomic data analysis

biotools.summary: MetaWRAP aims to be an easy-to-use metagenomic wrapper suite that accomplishes the core tasks of metagenomic analysis from start to finish: read quality control, assembly, visualization, taxonomic profiling, extracting draft genomes (binning), and functional annotation.

bioschemas.name: MetaWRAP
bioschemas.summary: MetaWRAP aims to be an easy-to-use metagenomic wrapper suite that accomplishes the core tasks of metagenomic analysis from start to finish: read quality control, assembly, visualization, taxonomic profiling, extracting draft genomes (binning), and functional annotation.

galaxy.summary: A flexible pipeline for genome-resolved metagenomic data analysis
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: MetaWRAP aims to be an easy-to-use metagenomic wrapper suite that accomplishes the core tasks of metagenomic analysis from start to finish: read quality control, assembly, visualization, taxonomic profiling, extracting draft genomes (binning), and functional annotation.
